body: I have wrote all the plugins for them and set them up. ~but it doesn't work yet, there is an issue with load and/or saving.~ It seems to be working now, it passes the tests and I've tested it with uTox. Depends on #1051. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/1046)

Ingvar is not making a PR anytime soon, so let's go ahead with this.
@sudden6 please still take a look when you have the chance.

commit.message:
Add messenger state plugin system.

This is for modules like groups to hook into to have their own state
management in the `tox_savedata` format.
